sentence.text: Herein, we report a third patient (not related to the previously reported family) with bilateral colobomatous microphthalmia and developmental delay in whom genetic studies identified a homozygous camera-type eye morphogenesis splicing mutation c.2968-2A>T (p.Val990Cysfs*13).

In a recent study combining autozygome and exome analysis, a homozygous loss of function mutation in camera-type eye morphogenesis (previously named ODZ3) was reported in two siblings with isolated bilateral colobomatous microphthalmia from a consanguineous Saudi family.
